content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Greetings Juan, it's a pleasure to meet you. The apartment you're interested in renting is 25 square meters in size, and I would like to maximize my gains. Can you offer a rental price that would be agreeable to both of us?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 350 Euros per month, including utilities.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you, Juan. That's an excellent offer, and I'm happy to accept it. The rental price of 350 Euros per month, including utilities, is a fair and reasonable price for this apartment. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 350 Euros per month, including utilities. I will pay cash in advance to secure the apartment.
I will also sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.
Lastly, I would like to request a maintenance check of the apartment before moving in.
Thank you for your understanding.
Best regards, Juan.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you, Juan, for your prompt payment and signing of the lease agreement. I appreciate your understanding and willingness to have a maintenance check of the apartment before moving in. I'm looking forward to a successful tenancy with you. Best regards!
name: Heinrich Heine
